bw-list-name.description: Specify a blacklist/whitelist name (Specify a blacklist/whitelist name)

timeout.description: Define timeout value of PBSLB dynamic entry (Timeout value (minute, default is 5))

use-destination-ip.description: Use destination IP to match the policy

over-limit.description: Specify operation in case over limit

over-limit-reset.description: Reset the connection when it exceeds limit

over-limit-lockup.description: Don't accept any new connection for certain time (Lockup duration (minute))

id.description: Specify id that maps to service group (The id number)

service-group.description: Specify a service group (Specify the service group name)

action-interval.description: Specify logging interval in minute (default is 3)

overlap.description: Use overlap mode for geo-location to do longest match

share.description: Share counters between virtual ports and virtual servers

full-domain-tree.description: Share counters between geo-location and sub regions

name.description: Class list name or geo-location-class-list name

client-ip.description: Set Client IP address, by default source IP address is used

client-ip-l3-dest.description: Use destination IP as client IP address

client-ip-l7-header.description: Use extract client IP address from L7 header

conn-rate-limit.description: Specify connection rate limit (Connection rate limit)

request-rate-limit.description: Request rate limit (Specify request rate limit)

bw-rate-limit.description: Specify bandwidth rate limit (Bandwidth rate limit in bytes)

enumMap.forward: "Forward the traffic even it exceeds limit

enumMap.reset: "Reset the connection when it exceeds limit

action-value.description: 'forward': "Forward the traffic even it exceeds limit;'reset': "Reset the connection when it exceeds limit;

lockout.description: Don't accept any new connection for certain time (Lockout duration in minutes)

interval.description: Specify log interval in minutes, by default system will log every over limit instance

direct-action.description: Set action when match the lid

direct-service-group.description: Specify a service group (Specify the service group name)

direct-action-interval.description: Specify logging interval in minute (default is 3)

response-code-rate-limit.description: Server response code rate limit(only support SMTP now)

threshold.description: the times of getting the response code

no-client-conn-reuse.description: Inspects only first request of a connection

ssli-url-filtering.description: 'bypassed-sni-disable': "Disable SNI filtering for bypassed URL's(enabled by default);'intercepted-sni-enable': "Enable SNI filtering for intercepted URL's(disabled by default);'intercepted-http-disable': "Disable HTTP(host/URL) filtering for intercepted URL's(enabled by default);'no-sni-allow': "Allow connection if SNI filtering is enabled and SNI header is not present(Drop by default);

enumMap.bypassed-sni-disable: "Disable SNI filtering for bypassed URL's(enabled by default)

enumMap.intercepted-sni-enable: "Enable SNI filtering for intercepted URL's(disabled by default)

enumMap.intercepted-http-disable: "Disable HTTP(host/URL) filtering for intercepted URL's(enabled by default)

enumMap.no-sni-allow: "Allow connection if SNI filtering is enabled and SNI header is not present(Drop by default)

action1.description: 'forward-to-internet': "Forward request to Internet;'forward-to-service-group': "Forward request to service group;'forward-to-proxy': "Forward request to HTTP proxy server;'drop': "Drop request;

fake-sg.description: service group to forward the packets to Internet

real-sg.description: service group to forward the packets

forward-snat.description: Source NAT pool or pool group

fall-back-snat.description: Source NAT pool or pool group for fallback server

drop-message.description: drop-message sent to the client as webpage(html tags are included and quotation marks are required for white spaces)

drop-redirect-url.description: Specify URL to which client request is redirected upon being dropped

match-authorize-policy.description: Authorize-policy for user and group based policy

priority.description: Priority of the source(higher the number higher the priority, default 0)
Priority value of the action(higher the number higher the priority)

web-category-list-list.obj-help: Configure web-category category-list for destination matching

priority.description: Priority value of the action(higher the number higher the priority)
